review_text: Didn't fit. Really didn't fit my stove
Not worth it. Poor quality

It's Ok.. It's ok.  Not very consistent person to person.  Some times it has a 40lb swing.  Novel idea.  Not sure it is worth the $.  I had a hard time getting it to set up properly.  I literally had to set it on the floor next to the wifi box to get it to notice wifi originally.
collapses while drying hair.. Collapses while trying to dry hair.  May be a spacesaver but such a pain.
Good purchase. Great for the price. Got on a lightning deal.

This might be a counterfeit product. The item looks the same as the original, and it is a very simple installation.  But when installed, the message on my fridge said it detected a problem and both water and ice were disabled.  I then purchased the same product at my local Best Buy, and sure enough there was no issue at all, and it functioned properly.
Damaged. Ordered 2 cans of hairspray. Both lids were cracked and one can was only half full and wouldn't spray.

Not compatible with all stove tops. I was so happy when I put the first two pans in and they fit like a glove. The next two did not fit and the burner ended up sitting on top of it. They would have looked great, had they fit.
Fire HD 10 Tablet. Didn't realize you couldn't play games on this device.
Nice filters. Purchased for my Cuisinart dcc-1200 coffee maker that I have had for three years. Necessary if you want clean water for your java.

Love it. If you're tired of spray bottles that soak your hair, your shirt, and leave water running down your face every time you try and wet your hair for styling, this is the product for you. I know that sounds corny, but it is a really good product.
good sound. very nice product. speakers are good. alexa speaks clearly and the picture is nice as well
it isn't good and it isn't bad. Meh, it isn't good and it isn't bad. I like it as a moisturizer. That is about it.
Not Kool enough. I meant to order the cool Kleenex  Those are thicker and way softer
Poor Quality. This item is of such poor quality that I doubt that it will last much more than a month or two. Every time I use it I wonder that the hot water didn't cause it to melt.
Two Stars. It’s beautiful
Five Stars. this stuff really works great makes your hair feel thicker
Not great. They shed bad.. These shed when you use them.
easy to install. So far it's working good  I have no complaints,The water taste good and is coming out at a good pace.

Melted to the dishwasher.... I loved this thing until today when I realized that it melted to the dishwasher. If you get it, make sure to move it around or not do two loads of dishes in a row because apparently it’ll melt? Not really sure when this happened since I have it in the same place all the time. We’re renting this apartment and the melted plastic isn’t coming off easily, so beware.
Very handy for your looseleafs.. Very convenient and well put together.  Definitely beyond worth the price.  It does sometimes worry me that I'm steeping plastic in boiling water.

Great cushion.. After having back surgery late last year I needed something to help ease the pressure on my tailbone.  This cushion, though it feels weird to sit on, works like a champ.  Takes most of the pressure off my tailbone so I can work and sit more comfortably.
Waste of Money. Very cheap!!!! I went and purchased a automatic brush washer.
Very Nice!. I absolutely love this spray bottle. I wanna throw all my cheap plastic spray bottles in the garbage.  It saturate your hair in just a few sprays. Love it!

Don't like the scent or consistency. This dmso is weak, it's greasy and the rose scent irritates my sinuses. I had read reviews saying that the smell was very light but that's not the case. I recently got another brand and I like it much better.

it feels like it is exfoliating. Because of the roughness, it feels like it is exfoliating.  But I noticed when I am removing self tanner after a few days - it does nothing.  Yet, I can use a wet facecloth and take off all the self tanner without a problem.  And the tanner is just on the outer layer of dead skin, which I assume is coming off with the facecloth.
Perfect!. They're perfect in every way....  Glad I brought them.

Good sound quality, Not Durable. Had to drop my review from 5 to 3 stars. I still think the sound quality, volume, and charge on both case and earbuds are fantastic but I'm on my second pair, after one of the buds died after ~6 months, and now one of the buds has again gone almost completely silent after less than 2 months. Pretty disappointed

HELP!!!. Bought a book from amazon days ago and still can't read it on the kindle. have been to u-tube, google, everywhere..no help..the book shows on kindle, but always asks do I want to stop download? I click no. does it take hours to download books? I'm on WIFI...HELP!!!
Suits me fine. I'm enjoying this. I keep it plugged in all the time in my workshop, so I don't know or care how long it holds a charge. Sound quality is more than adequate for my purposes.
Warning. Speakers do not play at the same volume. Who knows how long they will even last if they come out of the box like that
Awesome!. This is my 3rd one. love it! One on every T.V

Not happy with the audio quality. As an audiophile, I think they sounded horrible. The highs we're good, mid and lows were not good. Raised the volume and it sounded distorted. I found that cheaper headphones sounded better. The functions other than audio is great though.
Wasn't worth the buck I paid for it. Well, it didn't last long.
Five Stars. love it
Does not work!. Don't waiste your money! Does not work at all.
My 3rd firestick. Im addicted
Good. Expensive; but, does a good job.
Three Stars. OK product

Whirlpool will not honor a replacement if purchased from Amzone. This is the first issue I am having with this filter, but when we put this one on water leak all over the floor, my husband tried twice, each time he put the old on back there was no issue he put this one in and is is obviously  defective. BUT because I ordered it from Amazon Whirlpool will not honor a replacement.
Great mouse for the price. My wrist stopped hurting after I bought this mouse (Oct 2017).  It just pooped out on me, so I got 1.5 years out of it.  Not bad for the price!
not nearly as good as the squares. not nearly as good as the squares... tends to let the coffee sputter out of the pouring area while pouring hot waster into chemex
Remote didn't work.. Remote would not work. Got a refund and ordered the 4k stick

Not Happy. This was not an samsung replacement but a counterfit.  The one I ordered for a replacement was suppossed to have been mineral water filter. Not fresh water. It should have stated it was not a samsung filter.  The box looked old. It was made in Mexico. My water does not taste as good.
life saver. life saver
BEYOND EXCELLENT!. LOVE MY FIRE TV STICK! SO MANY OPTIONS SO MANY APPS! LOVE ALEXA ON THIS AS WELL! Saves time in searching!
Four Stars. Works as expected.
... seem to work well and maked the water taste funny.. Although the product had the right markings indicating it was made by GE the product doesn't seem to work well and maked the water taste funny.
One Star. The diffuser collapses easily. If I could give it a negative star I would.

Don't make a bit of difference in my home. I put one in my tiny office and another in my living room to help with cigarette smoke and animal odors.  I have not noticed one bit of difference in the smell of my home since I put them in.  I gave them two months, and now of course, cannot return them.  There is absolutely no change in either room and both rooms have no change in the air quality.

Does the job in a small room. Bought this to put in a small empty bedroom where I keep a litter box, it does a good job keeping the air clean. It is a bit noisy, but I don't mind that since it's in an empty room.
Practico. Cabello
Great EarPods. So far these earbuds sound SO much clearer than my older pair. Crystal clear and good sounds depth.

Not bad. Not bad at all. Arrived and was packed well. It holds a decent amount of water. Only issue i have is i wish a portion of the bottle was see thru so that you can gage how much water is left. But love the way this sprays. You can do a quick burst or a long mist. Definitely recommend.
Great hold for short "messy" styles.. Love this hairspray ••• holds all day, can be layered for extra body. Best hairspray I’ve used in years!

They're ok!. Sometimes you regret going cheaper for the sake of a bargain. This is one of those moments. They do the job... nothing fancy. Wish I'd spent more and got better clips but it is what it is.
Inconsistent. It’s great when it works. I just wish that were all the time...
great. great
Too tall. The smaller ones fit perfectly but the larger ones are strangely too tall
Four Stars. great

large drip pans are too large. I like the drip pans and the smaller ones fit fine but the larger size is too big for the opening it is supposed to fit into. It makes the pan sit about a 1/4" above the opening where it should fit tightly.
Caused red inflammation around brows.. Have used before, but this batch is causing red irritation around brows. Did formula change?  I'm throwing out and won't use again.
Not too smooth. Claims to not leave behind lint but definitely leaves behind little bits of fuzz.  Not super absorbent.  Actually feels a little rough.
Bad purchase for me. Bad purchase for me...made my coffee taste nasty.  I know it was the filter because the third pot I made I used a sheet of Bounty paper towel instead and my coffee was yummy.
Too big , not a good look on your dishwasher. Too big for dishwasher , doesn’t look good , took it off , read the dimensions, I over looked them
Awesome product..A+++. Awesome product..my fiance loved her birthday present
Disappointed. It seemed to work great for one minute but the pressure went way down before I even got clear water to come through.
Three Stars. it's a big small
Good idea, Poor manufacturing. These arrived with chips in the rim plastic, love the reusable aspect of the product.  Searching for a better made version for the same.

Good as ring device. I only got this device for my ring doorbell.  The thing I like is it rings on this device. The thing I dislike is how long it takes to show the ring doorbell. I wished that was an automatic feature since it's connected.  At any rate it is ok. Screen is too small for really using for cooking.

Wouldn't buy again. Slow and generally unimpressive. Has more glitches than Gary's mod. Disconnects ALL THE TIME. My echo dot works better. Touch screen has a delay and it seems like this little thing has to think extra hard to do anything.
Smart Device Indeed!!!. Awesome, love all these smart devices. No more turning Christmas tree on. I simply say, Alexa turn on/off Christmas tree!
Get what you pay for.. For what I paid for it. it was a real deal. As for a product, Amazon anything is destined to fail.
Baby safe but doesn’t get stains out. Love the idea but stains don’t come out easy and I don’t like the smell it leaves on clean clothes.
disapointed. this is too small; smaller than the previous 8.9 version

Great when it works, doesn't work for long. Pretty unreliable. I've ordered three of these, and I think the longest I've had one last so far is about eight months. The last one I ordered only lasted three months. It's really a shame that nobody makes reliable trackball devices anymore.
Love. I love the quality of these pads!  Will be purchasing again.  They are soft and absorbent.
Four Stars. works well
Kindle HD Fire 10inch. Something has gone wrong with charging, tried several outlets, it won't go past 55% even overnight.  UGH
Should be better for the Price. This should be way more accurate for the money aslo disappointed with the WiFi signal I have to be nearly right next to my router for it to work...
too big for original keurig. Too big.  The basket over flows when you use this thing.  Defeats the purpose.
Plastic?. I don’t like how there’s plastic. I like the other Puffs boxes!
Easy to apply. Easy to apply, covers very well, and the dark brown isn't too dark.  Looks very natural, didn't run, smudge or smear during application.
One Star. Had to return could use camera

Streaming issues. I can’t speak to all it’s features since I can’t get it to stream more than a few seconds at a time.  It keeps telling me the signal is lost, but when I check my signal through the tv it tells me it is strong... I’m not sure what to do, but not overly thrilled with it.
Two Stars. Cheaply made but does the job.

VERY DISAPPOINTING. I was really looking forward to this tablet to read instead of my defunct Kindle. This thing wouldn't even recognize my Wi-Fi when I was sitting at my desk top computer ONLINE. It kept saying 'no connection' and I'm actively on Amazon.com. Very disappointed to have an issue with this product right out of the package.
Silicone Stove Gap Covers. They don't fit properly.

Cool but nothing to write home about. There is a coolness factor but she loses connection all the time and really doesn't do it anything besides try to get me to subscribe to more services.
Not next happy with her.
but they look like the original one. i haven't used them yet, but they look like the original one.

Takes forever to drip. I usually buy the brown chemex filters. I saw good reviews on these and wanted to try them. It takes 5x as long for the water to drip through. It’s almost like it gets stuck and just sits there. I grind heart coffee on course 20g at a time, it shouldn’t be doing this. Wish I would’ve stuck with my normal filters. And I can’t return them.
Did not make bigger bubbles. Used for huge bubble recipe. Did not work well for that.
Doesn’t work with thick hair. Not for thick hair
Makes big mess of pods.. Very confusing to use with big hole on top.
Poor!. For some reason with this one our water does not get cooled down!
Disappointed. They take way to long to turn one.
Five Stars. Main ingredient in my diy juice for over two years
Remote stopped working. The remote has stopped working even when the batteries have been changed multiple times. It has been less than a year from when I bought it. It’s extremely disappointing.
Easy Install. Install was easy. Havent tasted the water yet but filter had good reviews. Will update after a few glasses of water

Poor quality, does not fit right.  Do not buy this C**P. I bought several times from the other vendors and pans were fine.  this time I bought the cheapest and was punished.  Pans do not fit right... do not buy this!

I dare a company to send me a curler that works better!. 110% recommend! Nothing curls my hair ever BUT bed head curlers! And it stays for days. The pics are from yesturday curls I didn't do anything but wake up and toss it in a pony tail. Do yourself a huge favor and get it!!!!
Not professional grade. It is not professional grade as it states..burnt my hand a few times..
but good product. I normally use straight sugar. Not as rough as I expected, but good product. I normally use straight sugar, so I like a very rough exfoliation.
It as expected. Stopped working. Worst Purchase.
